AuthMethod.Note: This should be User or Cert.

URL.Note: This should be a fully qualified domain name.  Include the Application Name.

KeyFormat.Note: This the SSH key file format to download.  Valid Values: PPK, PEM, OpenSSH
KeyFormat.Note2: For multiple file types seperate them with comma (,)

PassphraseRequired.Note: If a Key Passphrase is required set it to true.

OutFile.Note: Please use a fully qualified path and filename.  Do not include a file extension, it will be appended based on the Key Format.
OutFile.Warning: The back slash needs to be doubled to avoid issues with the JSON file.(\)

ThumbPrint.Note: This should be the thumbprint of the certificate to be used.  It needs to be stored on your YubiKey.

LogLevel.Note: This should be one of the following values; None, Error, Warning, Info, Debug, Verbose.

LogFile.Note: This should be a relative or fully qualified path.  Leave blank for none.
